dfpmin.c

00001 /* CGA Removed iteration limit and return test. */
00002 
00003 #include "math.h"
00004 
00005 #define ITMAX 200
00006 #define EPS 1.0e-10
00007 
00008 void my_dfpmin(p,n,ftol,iter,fret,func,dfunc)
00009 double p[],ftol,*fret,(*func)();
00010 void (*dfunc)();
00011 int n,*iter;
00012 {
00013         int j,i,its;
00014         double fp,fae,fad,fac;
00015         double *xi,*g,*dg,*hdg,*my_vector();
00016         double **hessin,**my_matrix();
00017         void my_dlinmin(),my_nrerror(),my_free_matrix(),my_free_vector();
00018 
00019         hessin=my_matrix(1,n,1,n);
00020         xi=my_vector(1,n);
00021         g=my_vector(1,n);
00022         dg=my_vector(1,n);
00023         hdg=my_vector(1,n);
00024         fp=(*func)(p);
00025         (*dfunc)(p,g);
00026         for (i=1;i<=n;i++) {
00027                 for (j=1;j<=n;j++) hessin[i][j]=0.0;
00028                 hessin[i][i]=1.0;
00029                 xi[i] = -g[i];
00030         }
00031         for (its=1; /* CGA its<=ITMAX */ ;its++) {
00032                 *iter=its;
00033                 my_dlinmin(p,xi,n,fret,func,dfunc);
00034                 /*
00035                 if (2.0*fabs(*fret-fp) <= ftol*(fabs(*fret)+fabs(fp)+EPS)) {
00036                         my_free_vector(hdg,1,n);
00037                         my_free_vector(dg,1,n);
00038                         my_free_vector(g,1,n);
00039                         my_free_vector(xi,1,n);
00040                         my_free_matrix(hessin,1,n,1,n);
00041                         return;
00042                 }
00043                 */
00044                 fp=(*fret);
00045                 for (i=1;i<=n;i++) dg[i]=g[i];
00046                 *fret=(*func)(p);
00047                 (*dfunc)(p,g);
00048                 for (i=1;i<=n;i++) dg[i]=g[i]-dg[i];
00049                 for (i=1;i<=n;i++) {
00050                         hdg[i]=0.0;
00051                         for (j=1;j<=n;j++) hdg[i] += hessin[i][j]*dg[j];
00052                 }
00053                 fac=fae=0.0;
00054                 for (i=1;i<=n;i++) {
00055                         fac += dg[i]*xi[i];
00056                         fae += dg[i]*hdg[i];
00057                 }
00058                 fac=1.0/fac;
00059                 fad=1.0/fae;
00060                 for (i=1;i<=n;i++) dg[i]=fac*xi[i]-fad*hdg[i];
00061                 for (i=1;i<=n;i++)
00062                         for (j=1;j<=n;j++)
00063                                 hessin[i][j] += fac*xi[i]*xi[j]
00064                                         -fad*hdg[i]*hdg[j]+fae*dg[i]*dg[j];
00065                 for (i=1;i<=n;i++) {
00066                         xi[i]=0.0;
00067                         for (j=1;j<=n;j++) xi[i] -= hessin[i][j]*g[j];
00068                 }
00069         }
00070         my_nrerror("Too many iterations in DFPMIN");
00071 }
00072 
00073 #undef ITMAX
00074 #undef EPS
